== Kavumannam (627331) ==

== Geographic Location and Population ==

Kavumannam is a village in the [[Vythiri]] taluka of [[Wayanad]] district with an area of 1622 hectares and harbouring 2358 households with total population of 10106 as per the 2011 Census. The nearest town [[Kalpetta]] is at a distance of 11 km. Male population is 5027 and female population is 5079. Scheduled Caste Population is 131 and Scheduled Tribes population is 2154. Census Location Code of the village is 627331<ref>http://www.censusindia.gov.in/2011census/dchb/DCHB.html</ref>.


== Literacy ==  
* Total literate population: 8139 (80.54%)
* Literate male population: 4174 (83.03%)
* Literate female population: 3965 (78.07%)
